Title: A Poor Reception
Description:
There's strong evidence that the Radiant Song is a warning from Azeroth herself. A cry for help.

That's why we're here. If this vision truly is Azeroth's message, Magni will know what she's trying to tell us.

He should be in the Chamber of the Heart. Let's go.
ObjectivesText: Go to the Heart Chamber to ask Magni for help deciphering the Radiant Song.
RewardText:
I know why you're here. It's the visions. Azeroth's voice, heard all across the lands. Ye thought I would know what she's trying to tell us. 

Well, ye thought wrong.
